# Transform Commands Complete reference for Vista Graphics transform commands. ## Transform Functions - **translate**: Translate coordinate system - **rotate**: Rotate coordinate system - **scale**: Scale coordinate system - **skew**: Skew coordinate system ## Matrix Operations - **reset-transform**: Reset transformation matrix - **save-transform**: Save transformation matrix - **restore-transform**: Restore transformation matrix ## Coordinate System - **coord-system**: Set coordinate system type - **origin**: Set origin point ## See Also - [API Reference](/vista/wiki/graphics/api-reference/) - All graphics APIs - [Transforms](/vista/wiki/graphics/transforms/) - Transform reference
